title: Looking for a duo partner to climb out of silver with.
body:
Hey guys, GV Pingu here. 
Im looking for someone to help me climb out of silver with, as I have no friends {{item:3070}}.
I mainly play top/jg or mid. But I really don't mind what I play as long as I enjoy it or get somewhat + lp gains. 
The champions I will be looking to play are :

{{champion:20}} yes the yeti, DONT JUDGE ME.
{{champion:85}} Check my win rate out on this bad boy.
{{champion:57}} Nature is op trust me.
{{champion:32}} Queue sad music 
{{champion:28}} !
{{champion:245}} Some times I like to play this guy. :')
{{champion:12}} And yes I can combo, most of the time. 

Im happy to play some other champs but these are what i feel most confident on as of now.  

So yeah thats it from me If you interested add GV Pingu :3 
- Have a nice day.
